TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit NamedElement extends System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.BlockElement

summary.span: 識別 下項目階層內的項目。

span.span: Identifies an element within the hierarchy of elements under a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每一頁[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]文件中包含項目，定義其*內容*的執行位置的文字和圖形形式。Each page of an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document contains a element that defines its *content* in the form of positional text runs and graphics. 透過使用文件結構項目，頁面[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]文件也會與相關聯定義的項目*結構*章節、 段落、 清單、 圖形的形式中的頁面和資料表。Through the use of document structure elements, pages of an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document can also be associated with elements that define the *structure* of the page in the form of sections, paragraphs, lists, figures, and tables. 類別用來定義與文件之標記的內容與結構的組件之間的關聯。The class is used to define the associations between content and structure parts of the document markup. A的子系結構化項目，例如資料表儲存格或項目符號清單項目，它位於網頁階層架構。A is the child of a structural element, such as a table cell or bullet list item that is located in the hierarchy of a page. A中的項目會識別階層相同的頁面。A identifies an item in the hierarchy of the same page. 它是指項目是結構化項目的內容。The item it refers to is the content of the structural element. 如需有關的結構項目[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]文件，請參閱第 9 章和附錄 E *XML Paper Specification (XPS)* 下載[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=67000 ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=67000)。For more information about structure elements of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] documents, see Chapter 9 and Appendix E of the *XML Paper Specification (XPS)* available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=67000](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=67000). ## Examples 下列範例示範使用並中的項目[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]文件，每個都有子系。The following example shows the use of and elements in an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] document, each with a child. [!code-xaml[DocumentStructure#DocStructParaStruct2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DocumentStructure/CSharp/Content/FixedPage2_structure.xaml#docstructparastruct2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應該與相同要項目的屬性參考。 should be identical to the attribute of the element to which the refers. ## Examples 下列範例將示範數個項目，各有屬性。The following example shows several elements, each with a attribute.
